message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a chance to purchase my product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $14,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice, but $14,000 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay.  I'm interested in the product, but I can only go up to $9,000 right now.  Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $9,000 is too low, I'm willing to come down to $12,500. I believe this price reflects the true value of the product.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  $12,500 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with.  I'm prepared to go up to $11,000, but that's my final offer.
